welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Keller, known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Keller has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport handles freight shipments and cargo flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Love Field Airport serves as a hub for Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
